title: [Ta'Illistim, Caear Var]
description: Crowds of patrons flock towards a large stone building.  The structure's central rotunda, covered with deep blue tiles, glitters brightly in the sunlight.  Heavily carved columns inlaid with glimmering multi-colored stones flank the structure's wide front doors.

Set close to the var is a large stone building with a central rotunda.  The building's dome, covered with deep blue tiles, contrasts with its heavily carved white marble columns, though the colorful hue is echoed in its mosaicked pediment.
